turn_off.name: Generic turn off
turn_off.description: Generic service to turn devices off under any domain.

turn_on.name: Generic turn on
turn_on.description: Generic service to turn devices on under any domain.

toggle.name: Generic toggle
toggle.description: Generic service to toggle devices on/off under any domain

check_config.name: Check configuration
check_config.description: Check the Home Assistant configuration files for errors. Errors will be displayed in the Home Assistant log.

update_entity.name: Update entity
update_entity.description: Force one or more entities to update its data

reload_config_entry.name: Reload config entry
reload_config_entry.description: Reload a config entry that matches a target.

create.description: Show a notification in the frontend.

message.description: Message body of the notification. [Templates accepted]

title.description: Optional title for your notification. [Optional, Templates accepted]

notification_id.description: Target ID of the notification, will replace a notification with the same ID. [Optional]

dismiss.description: Remove a notification from the frontend.

notification_id.description: Target ID of the notification, which should be removed. [Required]
Target ID of the notification, which should be mark read. [Required]

set_default_level.name: Set default level
set_default_level.description: Set the default log level for integrations.

level.name: Level
level.description: Default severity level for all integrations.

homeassistant.core.description: Example on how to change the logging level for a Home Assistant Core integrations. Possible values are debug, info, warn, warning, error, fatal, critical.

homeassistant.components.mqtt.description: Example on how to change the logging level for an Integration. Possible values are debug, info, warn, warning, error, fatal, critical.

custom_components.my_integration.description: Example on how to change the logging level for a Custom Integration. Possible values are debug, info, warn, warning, error, fatal, critical.

aiohttp.description: Example on how to change the logging level for a Python module. Possible values are debug, info, warn, warning, error, fatal, critical.

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Start purge task - to clean up old data from your database.

keep_days.name: Days to keep
keep_days.description: Number of history days to keep in database after purge.

repack.name: Repack
repack.description: Attempt to save disk space by rewriting the entire database file.

apply_filter.name: Apply filter
apply_filter.description: Apply entity_id and event_type filter in addition to time based purge.

disable.description: Stop the recording of events and state changes

level.name: Level
level.description: Log level: debug, info, warning, error, critical.

logger.name: Logger
logger.description: Logger name under which to log the message. Defaults to 'system_log.external'.

remote_connect.description: Make instance UI available outside over NabuCasa cloud

set_theme.name: Set theme
set_theme.description: Set a theme unless the client selected per-device theme.

name.name: Name
name.description: Name of a predefined theme, 'default' or 'none'.

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: The mode the theme is for, either 'dark' or 'light'.

log.description: Create a custom entry in your logbook

name.name: Name
name.description: Custom name for an entity, can be referenced with entity_id

message.name: Message
message.description: Message of the custom logbook entry

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: Entity to reference in custom logbook entry [Optional]

domain.name: Domain
domain.description: Icon of domain to display in custom logbook entry [Optional]

entities.name: Entities state
entities.description: The entities and the state that they need to be.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Transition duration in seconds it takes to bring devices to the state defined in the scene.

scene_id.name: Scene entity ID
scene_id.description: The entity_id of the new scene.

entities.name: Entities state
entities.description: The entities to control with the scene.

snapshot_entities.name: Snapshot entities
snapshot_entities.description: The entities of which a snapshot is to be taken

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Transition duration in seconds it takes to bring devices to the state defined in the scene.

alarm_disarm.name: Disarm
alarm_disarm.description: Send the alarm the command for disarm.

code.name: Code
code.description: An optional code to disarm the alarm control panel with.

alarm_arm_home.name: Arm home
alarm_arm_home.description: Send the alarm the command for arm home.

code.name: Code
code.description: An optional code to arm home the alarm control panel with.

alarm_arm_away.name: Arm away
alarm_arm_away.description: Send the alarm the command for arm away.

code.name: Code
code.description: An optional code to arm away the alarm control panel with.

alarm_arm_night.name: Arm night
alarm_arm_night.description: Send the alarm the command for arm night.

code.name: Code
code.description: An optional code to arm night the alarm control panel with.

code.name: Code
code.description: An optional code to arm custom bypass the alarm control panel with.

alarm_trigger.name: Trigger
alarm_trigger.description: Send the alarm the command for trigger.

code.name: Code
code.description: An optional code to trigger the alarm control panel with.

turn_on.name: Turn on
turn_on.description: Turn on one or more lights and adjust properties of the light, even when they are turned on already.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Duration in seconds it takes to get to next state.

rgb_color.name: RGB-color
rgb_color.description: A list containing three integers between 0 and 255 representing the RGB (red, green, blue) color for the light.

rgbw_color.name: RGBW-color
rgbw_color.description: A list containing four integers between 0 and 255 representing the RGBW (red, green, blue, white) color for the light.

rgbww_color.name: RGBWW-color
rgbww_color.description: A list containing five integers between 0 and 255 representing the RGBWW (red, green, blue, cold white, warm white) color for the light.

hs_color.name: Hue/Sat color
hs_color.description: Color for the light in hue/sat format. Hue is 0-360 and Sat is 0-100.

xy_color.name: XY-color
xy_color.description: Color for the light in XY-format.

color_temp.name: Color temperature (mireds)
color_temp.description: Color temperature for the light in mireds.

kelvin.name: Color temperature (Kelvin)
kelvin.description: Color temperature for the light in Kelvin.

brightness.name: Brightness value
brightness.description: Number between 0..255 indicating brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness and 255 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

brightness_pct.name: Brightness
brightness_pct.description: Number between 0..100 indicating percentage of full brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness and 100 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

brightness_step.name: Brightness step value
brightness_step.description: Change brightness by an amount. Should be between -255..255.

brightness_step_pct.name: Brightness step
brightness_step_pct.description: Change brightness by a percentage. Should be between -100..100.

profile.name: Profile
profile.description: Name of a light profile to use.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: If the light should flash. Valid values are short and long.

turn_off.name: Turn off
turn_off.description: Turns off one or more lights.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Duration in seconds it takes to get to next state.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: If the light should flash. Valid values are short and long.

toggle.name: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggles one or more lights, from on to off, or, off to on, based on their current state.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Duration in seconds it takes to get to next state.

rgb_color.name: RGB-color
rgb_color.description: Color for the light in RGB-format.

hs_color.name: Hue/Sat color
hs_color.description: Color for the light in hue/sat format. Hue is 0-360 and Sat is 0-100.

xy_color.name: XY-color
xy_color.description: Color for the light in XY-format.

color_temp.name: Color temperature (mireds)
color_temp.description: Color temperature for the light in mireds.

kelvin.name: Color temperature (Kelvin)
kelvin.description: Color temperature for the light in Kelvin.

white_value.name: White level
white_value.description: Number between 0..255 indicating level of white.

brightness.name: Brightness value
brightness.description: Number between 0..255 indicating brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness and 255 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

brightness_pct.name: Brightness
brightness_pct.description: Number between 0..100 indicating percentage of full brightness, where 0 turns the light off, 1 is the minimum brightness and 100 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

profile.name: Profile
profile.description: Name of a light profile to use.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: If the light should flash. Valid values are short and long.

turn_on.name: Turn on
turn_on.description: Turn a media player power on.

turn_off.name: Turn off
turn_off.description: Turn a media player power off.

toggle.name: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggles a media player power state.

volume_up.name: Turn up volume
volume_up.description: Turn a media player volume up.

volume_down.name: Turn down volume
volume_down.description: Turn a media player volume down.

media_play.name: Play
media_play.description: Send the media player the command for play.

media_pause.name: Pause
media_pause.description: Send the media player the command for pause.

media_stop.name: Stop
media_stop.description: Send the media player the stop command.

media_next_track.name: Next
media_next_track.description: Send the media player the command for next track.

media_previous_track.name: Previous
media_previous_track.description: Send the media player the command for previous track.

clear_playlist.name: Clear playlist
clear_playlist.description: Send the media player the command to clear players playlist.

volume_set.name: Set volume
volume_set.description: Set a media player's volume level.

volume_level.name: Level
volume_level.description: Volume level to set as float.

media_seek.name: Seek
media_seek.description: Send the media player the command to seek in current playing media.

seek_position.name: Position
seek_position.description: Position to seek to. The format is platform dependent.

join.name: Join
join.description: Group players together. Only works on platforms with support for player groups.

group_members.description: The players which will be synced with the target player.

select_source.name: Select source
select_source.description: Send the media player the command to change input source.

source.name: Source
source.description: Name of the source to switch to. Platform dependent.

select_sound_mode.name: Select sound mode
select_sound_mode.description: Send the media player the command to change sound mode.

sound_mode.name: Sound mode
sound_mode.description: Name of the sound mode to switch to.

play_media.name: Play media
play_media.description: Send the media player the command for playing media.

media_content_id.name: Content ID
media_content_id.description: The ID of the content to play. Platform dependent.

media_content_type.name: Content type
media_content_type.description: The type of the content to play. Like image, music, tvshow, video, episode, channel or playlist.

unjoin.name: Unjoin
unjoin.description: Unjoin the player from a group. Only works on platforms with support for player groups.

repeat.name: Repeat mode
repeat.description: Repeat mode to set (off, all, one).

reload.name: Reload
reload.description: Reload group configuration, entities, and notify services.

object_id.name: Object ID
object_id.description: Group id and part of entity id.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: Name of icon for the group.

entities.name: Entities
entities.description: List of all members in the group. Not compatible with 'delta'.

add_entities.name: Add Entities
add_entities.description: List of members that will change on group listening.

all.name: All
all.description: Enable this option if the group should only turn on when all entities are on.

object_id.name: Object ID
object_id.description: Group id and part of entity id.

refresh_library.name: Refresh library
refresh_library.description: Refresh a Plex library to scan for new and updated media.

server_name.name: Server name
server_name.description: Name of a Plex server if multiple Plex servers configured.

library_name.name: Library name
library_name.description: Name of the Plex library to refresh.

scan_for_clients.name: Scan for clients
scan_for_clients.description: Scan for available clients from the Plex server(s), local network, and plex.tv.

set_cover_position.name: Set position
set_cover_position.description: Move to specific position all or specified cover.

open_cover_tilt.name: Open tilt
open_cover_tilt.description: Open all or specified cover tilt.

close_cover_tilt.name: Close tilt
close_cover_tilt.description: Close all or specified cover tilt.

set_cover_tilt_position.name: Set tilt position
set_cover_tilt_position.description: Move to specific position all or specified cover tilt.

select_option.name: Select
select_option.description: Select an option of an input select entity.

select_next.name: Next
select_next.description: Select the next options of an input select entity.

cycle.name: Cycle
cycle.description: If the option should cycle from the last to the first.

select_previous.name: Previous
select_previous.description: Select the previous options of an input select entity.

cycle.name: Cycle
cycle.description: If the option should cycle from the first to the last.

select_first.name: First
select_first.description: Select the first option of an input select entity.

select_last.name: Last
select_last.description: Select the last option of an input select entity.

set_options.name: Set options
set_options.description: Set the options of an input select entity.

options.name: Options
options.description: Options for the input select entity.

set_value.name: Set
set_value.description: Set the value of an input text entity.

value.name: Value
value.description: The target value the entity should be set to.

set_datetime.name: Set
set_datetime.description: This can be used to dynamically set the date and/or time.

date.name: Date
date.description: The target date the entity should be set to.

time.name: Time
time.description: The target time the entity should be set to.

datetime.name: Date & Time
datetime.description: The target date & time the entity should be set to.

timestamp.name: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The target date & time the entity should be set to as expressed by a UNIX timestamp.

duration.description: Duration the timer requires to finish. [optional]

set_value.name: Set
set_value.description: Set the value of an input number entity.

value.name: Value
value.description: The target value the entity should be set to.

increment.name: Increment
increment.description: Increment the value of an input number entity by its stepping.

decrement.name: Decrement
decrement.description: Decrement the value of an input number entity by its stepping.

minimum.name: Minimum
minimum.description: New minimum value for the counter or None to remove minimum.

maximum.name: Maximum
maximum.description: New maximum value for the counter or None to remove maximum.

activity.description: Activity ID or Activity Name to start.

send_command.name: Send Command
send_command.description: Sends a command or a list of commands to a device.

device.name: Device
device.description: Device ID to send command to.

command.name: Command
command.description: A single command or a list of commands to send.

num_repeats.name: Repeats
num_repeats.description: An optional value that specifies the number of times you want to repeat the command(s).

delay_secs.name: Delay Seconds
delay_secs.description: Specify the number of seconds you want to wait in between repeated commands.

hold_secs.name: Hold Seconds
hold_secs.description: An optional value that specifies the number of seconds you want to have it held before the release is send.

learn_command.name: Learn Command
learn_command.description: Learns a command or a list of commands from a device.

device.description: Device ID to learn command from.

command.name: Command
command.description: A single command or a list of commands to learn.

command_type.name: Command Type
command_type.description: The type of command to be learned.

alternative.name: Alternative
alternative.description: If code must be stored as alternative (useful for discrete remotes).

timeout.name: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout, in seconds, for the command to be learned.

delete_command.name: Delete Command
delete_command.description: Deletes a command or a list of commands from the database.

device.description: Name of the device from which commands will be deleted.

command.name: Command
command.description: A single command or a list of commands to delete.

start_network.description: Start the Z-Wave network. This might take a while, depending on how big your Z-Wave network is.

add_node.description: Add a new (unsecure) node to the Z-Wave network. Refer to OZW_Log.txt for progress.

add_node_secure.description: Add a new node to the Z-Wave network with secure communications. Secure network key must be set, this process will fallback to add_node (unsecure) for unsupported devices. Note that unsecure devices can't directly talk to secure devices. Refer to OZW_Log.txt for progress.

remove_node.description: Remove a node from the Z-Wave network. Refer to OZW_Log.txt for progress.

cancel_command.description: Cancel a running Z-Wave controller command. Use this to exit add_node, if you weren't going to use it but activated it.

heal_network.description: Start a Z-Wave network heal. This might take a while and will slow down the Z-Wave network greatly while it is being processed. Refer to OZW_Log.txt for progress.

return_routes.description: Whether or not to update the return routes from the nodes to the controller. Defaults to False.

soft_reset.description: This will reset the controller without removing its data. Use carefully because not all controllers support this. Refer to your controller's manual.

test_network.description: This will send test to nodes in the Z-Wave network. This will greatly slow down the Z-Wave network while it is being processed. Refer to OZW_Log.txt for progress.

stop_network.description: Stop the Z-Wave network, all updates into Home Assistant will stop.

rename_node.description: Set the name of a node. This will also affect the IDs of all entities in the node.

node_id.description: ID of the node to rename.

update_ids.description: (optional) Rename the entity IDs for entities of this node.

rename_value.description: Set the name of a node value. This will affect the ID of the value entity. Value IDs can be queried from /api/zwave/values/{node_id}

node_id.description: ID of the node to rename.

value_id.description: ID of the value to rename.

update_ids.description: (optional) Update the entity ID for this value's entity.

set_config_parameter.description: Set a config parameter to a node on the Z-Wave network.

node_id.description: Node id of the device to set config parameter to (integer).

value.description: Value to set for parameter. (String value for list and bool parameters, integer for others).

size.description: (Optional) Set the size of the parameter value. Only needed if no parameters are available.

set_node_value.description: Set the value for a given value_id on a Z-Wave device.

node_id.description: Node id of the device to set the value on (integer).

value_id.description: Value id of the value to set (integer or string).

refresh_node_value.description: Refresh the value for a given value_id on a Z-Wave device.

node_id.description: Node id of the device to refresh value from (integer).

value_id.description: Value id of the value to refresh.

print_config_parameter.description: Prints a Z-Wave node config parameter value to log.

node_id.description: Node id of the device to print the parameter from (integer).

remove_failed_node.description: This command will remove a failed node from the network. The node should be on the controller's failed nodes list, otherwise this command will fail. Refer to OZW_Log.txt for progress.

node_id.description: Node id of the device to remove (integer).

replace_failed_node.description: Replace a failed node with another. If the node is not in the controller's failed nodes list, or the node responds, this command will fail. Refer to OZW_Log.txt for progress.

node_id.description: Node id of the device to replace (integer).

change_association.description: Change an association in the Z-Wave network.

node_id.description: Node id of the node to set association for.

target_node_id.description: Node id of the node to associate to.

group.description: Group number to set association for.

instance.description: (Optional) Instance of multichannel association. Defaults to 0.

set_wakeup.description: Sets wake-up interval of a node.

node_id.description: Node id of the device to set the wake-up interval for. (integer)

value.description: Value of the interval to set. (integer)

print_node.description: Print all information about z-wave node.

node_id.description: Node id of the device to print.

entity_id.description: Name of the entity to refresh.

node_id.description: ID of the node to refresh.

reset_node_meters.description: Resets the meter counters of a node.

node_id.description: Node id of the device to reset meters for. (integer)

instance.description: (Optional) Instance of association. Defaults to instance 1.

set_poll_intensity.description: Set the polling interval to a nodes value

node_id.description: ID of the node to set polling to.

value_id.description: ID of the value to set polling to.

poll_intensity.description: The intensity to poll, 0 = disabled, 1 = Every time through list, 2 = Every second time through list...

heal_node.description: Start a Z-Wave node heal. Refer to OZW_Log.txt for progress.

return_routes.description: Whether or not to update the return routes from the node to the controller. Defaults to False.

test_node.description: This will send test messages to a node in the Z-Wave network. This could bring back dead nodes.

node_id.description: ID of the node to send test messages to.

messages.description: Optional. Amount of test messages to send.

persistent_notification.name: Send a persistent notification
persistent_notification.description: Sends a notification to the visible in the front-end.

message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

mobile_app_adam_s_pixel_2.name: Send a notification via mobile_app_adam_s_pixel_2
mobile_app_adam_s_pixel_2.description: Sends a notification message using the mobile_app_adam_s_pixel_2 integration.

message.name: Message
message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

target.description: An array of targets to send the notification to. Optional depending on the platform.

data.name: Data
data.description: Extended information for notification. Optional depending on the platform.

mobile_app_kfkawi.description: Sends a notification message using the mobile_app_kfkawi integration.

message.name: Message
message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

target.description: An array of targets to send the notification to. Optional depending on the platform.

data.name: Data
data.description: Extended information for notification. Optional depending on the platform.

mobile_app_ipad.name: Send a notification via mobile_app_ipad
mobile_app_ipad.description: Sends a notification message using the mobile_app_ipad integration.

message.name: Message
message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

target.description: An array of targets to send the notification to. Optional depending on the platform.

data.name: Data
data.description: Extended information for notification. Optional depending on the platform.

notify.name: Send a notification with notify
notify.description: Sends a notification message using the notify service.

message.name: Message
message.example: The garage door has been open for 10 minutes.

target.description: An array of targets to send the notification to. Optional depending on the platform.

data.name: Data
data.description: Extended information for notification. Optional depending on the platform.

code.name: Code
code.description: An optional code to unlock the lock with.

code.name: Code
code.description: An optional code to lock the lock with.

code.name: Code
code.description: An optional code to open the lock with.

code_slot.description: Code slot to set the code.
Code slot to retrieve a code from.
Code slot to clear code from.

increase_speed.name: Increase speed
increase_speed.description: Increase the speed of the fan by one speed or a percentage_step.

decrease_speed.name: Decrease speed
decrease_speed.description: Decrease the speed of the fan by one speed or a percentage_step.

set_preset_mode.name: Set preset mode
set_preset_mode.description: Set preset mode for a fan device.

google_translate_say.name: Say an TTS message with google_translate
google_translate_say.description: Say something using text-to-speech on a media player with google_translate.

cache.name: Cache
cache.description: Control file cache of this message.

language.name: Language
language.description: Language to use for speech generation.

options.name: Options
options.description: A dictionary containing platform-specific options. Optional depending on the platform.

clear_cache.name: Clear TTS cache
clear_cache.description: Remove all text-to-speech cache files and RAM cache.

set_hvac_mode.name: Set HVAC mode
set_hvac_mode.description: Set HVAC operation mode for climate device.

set_preset_mode.name: Set preset mode
set_preset_mode.description: Set preset mode for climate device.

set_aux_heat.name: Turn on/off auxiliary heater
set_aux_heat.description: Turn auxiliary heater on/off for climate device.

set_temperature.name: Set temperature
set_temperature.description: Set target temperature of climate device.

target_temp_high.name: Target temperature high
target_temp_high.description: New target high temperature for HVAC.

target_temp_low.name: Target temperature low
target_temp_low.description: New target low temperature for HVAC.

hvac_mode.name: HVAC mode
hvac_mode.description: HVAC operation mode to set temperature to.

set_humidity.name: Set target humidity
set_humidity.description: Set target humidity of climate device.

humidity.name: Humidity
humidity.description: New target humidity for climate device.

set_fan_mode.name: Set fan mode
set_fan_mode.description: Set fan operation for climate device.

set_swing_mode.name: Set swing mode
set_swing_mode.description: Set swing operation for climate device.

trigger.name: Trigger
trigger.description: Trigger the actions of an automation.

skip_condition.name: Skip conditions
skip_condition.description: Whether or not the conditions will be skipped.

search.description: Emulates opening the search screen and entering the search keyword.

master.name: Master
master.description: Entity ID of the player that should become the coordinator of the group.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Name of entity that will join the master.

unjoin.name: Unjoin group
unjoin.description: Unjoin the player from a group.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Name of entity that will be unjoined from their group.

snapshot.name: Snapshot
snapshot.description: Take a snapshot of the media player.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Name of entity that will be snapshot.

with_group.name: With group
with_group.description: True or False. Also snapshot the group layout.

restore.name: Restore
restore.description: Restore a snapshot of the media player.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Name of entity that will be restored.

with_group.name: With group
with_group.description: True or False. Also restore the group layout.

sleep_time.name: Sleep Time
sleep_time.description: Number of seconds to set the timer.

update_alarm.name: Update alarm
update_alarm.description: Updates an alarm with new time and volume settings.

alarm_id.name: Alarm ID
alarm_id.description: ID for the alarm to be updated.

include_linked_zones.name: Include linked zones
include_linked_zones.description: Enable or disable including grouped rooms.

play_queue.name: Play queue
play_queue.description: Start playing the queue from the first item.

queue_position.name: Queue position
queue_position.description: Position of the song in the queue to start playing from.

remove_from_queue.name: Remove from queue
remove_from_queue.description: Removes an item from the queue.

queue_position.name: Queue position
queue_position.description: Position in the queue to remove.

show_lovelace_view.name: Show lovelace view
show_lovelace_view.description: Show a Lovelace view on a Chromecast.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Media Player entity to show the Lovelace view on.

dashboard_path.name: Dashboard path
dashboard_path.description: The URL path of the Lovelace dashboard to show.

view_path.name: View Path
view_path.description: The path of the Lovelace view to show.

dev_id.name: Device ID
dev_id.description: Id of device (find id in known_devices.yaml).

location_name.name: Location name
location_name.description: Name of location where device is located (not_home is away).

gps.name: GPS coordinates
gps.description: GPS coordinates where device is located (latitude, longitude).

change_channel.description: Sends change channel command to the Harmony HUB

entity_id.description: Name(s) of Harmony remote entities to send change channel command to

start.description: Send a start command to a ffmpeg based sensor.

entity_id.description: Name(s) of entities that will start. Platform dependent.

stop.description: Send a stop command to a ffmpeg based sensor.

entity_id.description: Name(s) of entities that will stop. Platform dependent.

restart.description: Send a restart command to a ffmpeg based sensor.

entity_id.description: Name(s) of entities that will restart. Platform dependent.
